description:
The Sunnyday Field hat protects kids while they explore tide pools and climb-able trees.

  • Quick-dry fabric has a DWR finish to shed summer rain
  • UPF 50+ rated material blocks more than 98% of UV
  • Polyester sweatband wicks moisture
  • Quick-release chin strap keeps it in place when the wind kicks up but comes safely undone with a tug
  • Name label inside
name: MEC Sunnyday Field Hat - Children
